name: Rocket Knockback
description:
Requires XBox Controllers to play

King of the Hill multiplayer robot-shooter.

Win Conditions:

- Capture the middle point

OR

- Reduce the enemy team's lives to 0

Controls:

- Once started, press the BACK button to activate/deactivate players (up to 4 players)

- Press A to Jump

- Press Right Trigger to Shoot

- Press Right Shoulder to Grab

More At:

www.KlamSquared.com
